channel.title: Poss, Jumped into King then became Neutral king?
channel.description:
https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/476885183346507797/480234344561115149/unknown.png?width=267&height=138 https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/476885183346507797/480234397417734144/unknown.png?width=685&height=430
So I got Possessor and Jumped into the king and for some reason I became a Neutral king that, had two Sf's and 3 guards, I couldn't finger but I could decide fate more then once.
